title: Blended Learning-Based Project Design for Enhancing Assessment Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic assessment methodologies and experience with monitoring tools
context.additional_context: Aims to develop actual evaluation competencies through job-linked project execution by current practitioners. Emphasizes comparative analysis of regional evaluation cases and building collaborative networks.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose real workplace problems and propose improvement plans using project-based assessment tools.
Learners can conduct peer reviews and incorporate feedback through online collaboration platforms.
Learners can analyze evaluation data and generate decision-support materials by applying mathematical modeling techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
